abstract: Citing deepening problems in the mortgage market, Standard & Poor’s on Wednesday cut the rating of one troubled bond insurer, ACA Financial, and assigned a negative outlook to ratings of four other companies that guarantee debts tied to home loans.
lead_paragraph: Citing deepening problems in the mortgage market, Standard & Poor’s on Wednesday cut the rating of one troubled bond insurer, ACA Financial, and assigned a negative outlook to ratings of four other companies that guarantee debts tied to home loans.

headline.main: S&P Cuts Rating on Bond Insurer ACA
